mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunCode
select distinct dongName, dongCode from houseinfo where left(dongCode, 5) = #{gugun} order by dongName

select h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where dongCode = #{dong} order by aptName
select * from houseinfo where (lat between #{swLat} and #{neLat}) and (lng between #{swLng} and #{neLng})
select * from housedeal where aptCode=#{aptCode} order by dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay
select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = #{aptCode} order by dealyear desc, dealMonth desc, dealDay desc limit 1;
select * from houseinfo where aptName like concat("%", #{name},"%");
